questions.name: Check this box if you have the authority to sign legal documents on behalf of your company.
Is this the first time you submit a project for funding with Climatize?
Please describe your business model
questions.value: We develop front-of-meter energy storage projects connected to the distribution grid. We typically contracted with utilities and community choice aggregators for a long-term, fixed price full-toll contract for these assets. We sell projects at NTP.

Project or Portfolio Name
questions.value: San Diego Local Energy Storage Portfolio

questions.name: What technology are you raising capital for?
By when do you need the capital?
Project Description
questions.value: We are developing a fleet of energy storage assets for San Diego Community Power. Projects have site control and have filed interconnection.

questions.name: Describe the use of funds
questions.value: Funding will be used to finance the permitting and interconnection processes to achieve notice-to-proceed and ultimately sell projects.
